features.flow: User lands on homepage, navigates to About Us section, views company overview information
screens: Homepage: displays navigation menu and links to different sections
About Us Page: provides an overview of the company, its mission, vision, and history

features.flow: User lands on homepage, navigates to Services section, views overview of company services
screens: Homepage: displays navigation menu and links to different sections
Services Page: provides an overview of the services offered by the company, including tour services, visa consultation, and others

features.flow: User visits the homepage -> Views featured tours section -> Clicks on a featured tour -> Views tour details
screens: Homepage: Displays featured tours section
Tour Details Page: Shows details of the selected featured tour

features.flow: User visits the homepage -> Clicks on tour categories -> Views list of tour categories -> Selects a category -> Views tours in that category
screens: Homepage: Displays tour categories link
Tour Categories Page: Lists all tour categories
Category Tours Page: Displays tours in the selected category

features.flow: User clicks on a tour -> Views tour details -> Views itinerary -> Views services -> Views pricing -> Views terms and conditions
screens: Tour Details Page: Shows overview of the tour
Itinerary Page: Displays tour itinerary
Tour Package Services Page: Lists services included in the tour
Pricing Page: Shows pricing information for the tour
Terms & Conditions Page: Displays terms and conditions for the tour

features.flow: User views tour details -> Clicks on itinerary -> Views detailed itinerary
screens: Itinerary Page: Displays detailed tour itinerary

features.flow: User views tour details -> Clicks on services -> Views services included in the tour
screens: Tour Package Services Page: Lists services included in the tour

features.flow: User views tour details -> Clicks on pricing -> Views pricing information
screens: Pricing Page: Shows pricing information for the tour

features.flow: User views tour details -> Clicks on terms and conditions -> Views terms and conditions
screens: Terms & Conditions Page: Displays terms and conditions for the tour

features.flow: User views tour details -> Views tour images
screens: Tour Details Page: Displays tour images

features.flow: User views tour details -> Clicks on policies -> Views tour policies
screens: Tour Policies Page: Displays policies for the tour

features.flow: User navigates to the News section, views a list of news articles, selects an article to read, and views the full content of the selected news article. User role: Visitor.
screens: News List Screen: Displays a list of news articles with titles and brief summaries.
News Detail Screen: Shows the full content of a selected news article, including title, date, and detailed text.

features.flow: User navigates to the Promotions section, views a list of ongoing promotions, selects a promotion to view details, and views the full content of the selected promotion. User role: Visitor.
screens: Promotions List Screen: Lists ongoing promotions with images and brief descriptions.
Promotion Detail Screen: Displays detailed information about a selected promotion, including terms and conditions.

features.flow: User navigates to the Articles section, views a list of articles, selects an article to read, and views the full content of the selected article. User role: Visitor.
screens: Articles List Screen: Presents a list of articles with titles and summaries.
Article Detail Screen: Shows the full content of a selected article, including title and detailed text.

features.flow: User navigates to the Travel Stories section, views a list of travel stories, selects a story to read, and views the full content of the selected travel story. User role: Visitor.
screens: Travel Stories List Screen: Displays a list of travel stories with images and brief summaries.
Travel Story Detail Screen: Provides the full content of a selected travel story, including title, text, and possibly images or videos.

features.flow: User navigates to the Cultural Articles section, views a list of cultural articles, selects an article to read, and views the full content of the selected cultural article. User role: Visitor.
screens: Cultural Articles List Screen: Lists cultural articles with titles and brief descriptions.
Cultural Article Detail Screen: Shows the full content of a selected cultural article, including title, text, and possibly images or related information.

features.flow: User visits the website, navigates to the 'Other Services' section, selects 'Visa Consultation', fills out a consultation form with required details (name, email, phone number, type of visa needed, travel dates), submits the form, receives a confirmation email with a reference number, and is contacted by a visa consultant for further assistance.
screens: Home Screen: General website homepage
Other Services Screen: Lists all other services including Visa Consultation
Visa Consultation Screen: Provides information on visa consultation services and a form to fill out
Visa Consultation Form Screen: Detailed form for users to input their consultation request
Confirmation Screen: Displays a confirmation message and sends an email with a reference number

features.flow: User navigates to the 'Other Services' section, selects 'Customer Feedback', is redirected to a feedback form, fills out the form with their feedback (rating, comments), submits it, and receives a confirmation that their feedback has been recorded.
screens: Home Screen: General website homepage
Other Services Screen: Lists all other services including Customer Feedback
Customer Feedback Screen: Introduction to the feedback process
Feedback Form Screen: Form for users to input their feedback
Confirmation Screen: Acknowledges receipt of the feedback

features.flow: User visits the 'Other Services' section, selects 'Customer Reviews', is taken to a page with a list of reviews, can filter reviews by rating or date, and can navigate to a detailed review page for more information.
screens: Home Screen: General website homepage
Other Services Screen: Lists all other services including Customer Reviews
Customer Reviews Screen: Lists customer reviews with filtering options
Detailed Review Screen: Detailed view of a specific review

features.flow: User navigates to the Contact page, views available contact methods (e.g., email, contact form, physical address), and selects a preferred method to initiate contact. User role: Visitor/Customer. Steps: 1. Navigate to Contact page. 2. View contact options. 3. Choose a contact method. 4. Initiate contact.
screens: Contact Page: Displays various contact options including email, contact form, and physical address.

features.flow: User navigates to the Contact page or clicks on a hotline link, views hotline numbers, and decides to call or save the number. User role: Visitor/Customer. Steps: 1. Navigate to Contact page or click hotline link. 2. View hotline numbers. 3. Call or save the hotline number.
screens: Contact Page: Includes a section for hotlines with phone numbers and possibly a call button.
Hotline Link: A direct link to hotline numbers, possibly in the header or footer.
